ComicInfo.Title: For the Life of Asgard!
ComicInfo.Summary: For the Life of Asgard!: Thor travels to the other pantheons, hoping to borrow a little bit of power from each to raise Odin from the dead after he and all Asgard were destroyed by the Celestials. When Shiva refuses Thor they battle until Thor convinces Shiva to help him in his quest.
